# ‚ö° C6 ‚Äî Imperative Irregulars & Pronouns

**Goal:** Command with high-frequency irregulars and place pronouns correctly in affirmative vs. negative orders.

---

## üîÅ Key Irregular Affirmatives
| Verb | t√∫ | usted | vosotros | ustedes | Pattern note |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| **decir** | **di** | diga | decid | digan | Stem change to **di-**
| **hacer** | **haz** | haga | haced | hagan | Drop -cer ‚Üí **haz**
| **ir** | **ve** | vaya | id | vayan | t√∫ form reuses **ve** (from *venir*)
| **poner** | **pon** | ponga | poned | pongan | -go verbs ‚Üí **pon-**
| **salir** | **sal** | salga | salid | salgan | -go verbs ‚Üí **sal-**
| **ser** | **s√©** | sea | sed | sean | Accented t√∫: **s√©**
| **tener** | **ten** | tenga | tened | tengan | -go verbs ‚Üí **ten-**
| **venir** | **ven** | venga | venid | vengan | -go verbs ‚Üí **ven-**

> üìå Only the **t√∫** form is highly irregular. Ud./Uds./vosotros use the present subjunctive (vosotros = drop *-r* + *-d*).

---

## üö´ Negative Imperatives
- Formed with **no + present subjunctive** for every person (including t√∫).
- Same irregular stems as the subjunctive (diga, salgas, vay√°is‚Ä¶).

| Verb | no t√∫ | no usted | no vosotros | no ustedes |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| decir | no digas | no diga | no dig√°is | no digan |
| hacer | no hagas | no haga | no hag√°is | no hagan |
| ir | no vayas | no vaya | no vay√°is | no vayan |
| poner | no pongas | no ponga | no pong√°is | no pongan |
| salir | no salgas | no salga | no salg√°is | no salgan |
| ser | no seas | no sea | no se√°is | no sean |
| tener | no tengas | no tenga | no teng√°is | no tengan |
| venir | no vengas | no venga | no veng√°is | no vengan |

> üß† Remember **ir**: affirmative nosotros ‚Üí *vamos*, negative ‚Üí *no vayamos*; with pronouns ‚Üí *v√°monos* / *no nos vayamos*.

---

## üì¶ Pronoun Placement Rules
- **Affirmative commands:** Attach object/reflexive pronouns to the **end** ‚Üí *dime*, *h√°ganlo*, *si√©ntense*. Add an accent to keep the original stress when needed (usually 3+ syllables).
- **Negative commands:** Pronouns go **before** the verb, after **no** ‚Üí *no me digas*, *no se lo pongan*.
- **Double pronouns:** Order stays **IOP + DOP** (me/te/le/se + lo/la/los/las). Affirmative ‚Üí *d√≠melo*; Negative ‚Üí *no me lo des*.
- **Reflexive vosotros:** drop **-d** + **os** ‚Üí *levantad* ‚Üí *levantaos* (accent often unnecessary except with 2 pronouns: *daoslo* ‚Üí *da√≥selo*).

> ‚úÖ Command strategy: Memorize the 8 irregular t√∫ forms, then fall back on the subjunctive for everything else. Pronoun placement flips with negative commands.

exercises.promptMd: Conjugate **decir** in the **imperativo afirmativo** (t√∫, usted, vosotros, ustedes).

exercises.promptMd: Complete with the correct **affirmative command + pronoun**: *‚ÄîSe√±or, ___ (decir, usted) la verdad.*

feedback.wrong: Use affirmative command diga + me + la attached: **d√≠gamela** (accent preserves stress).

exercises.promptMd: Fill in: *Chicos, ___ (poner, vosotros) el abrigo.* (use pronoun **os**).

feedback.correct: Bien ‚Äî vosotros affirmative drops -d + os ‚Üí **poneos**.
feedback.wrong: Use **poneos** (poned + os ‚Üí drop the d).

exercises.promptMd: Negative command with pronouns: *Por favor, ___ (no + dar + me + lo, t√∫).*

feedback.correct: Exacto ‚Äî negative keeps pronouns before: **no me lo des**.
feedback.wrong: Use **no me lo des** (no + pronouns + subjunctive).

exercises.promptMd: Translate: *Let's leave now (referring to ourselves).*

feedback.correct: Correct ‚Äî affirmative nosotros of irse attaches **-nos** ‚Üí v√°monos.
feedback.wrong: Use **V√°monos ahora** (vamos + nos with accent).

exercises.promptMd: Choose the correct placement: *___ la tarea ahora mismo.*

exercises.promptMd: Which option correctly negates the command with pronouns? *No ___ el secreto.*

feedback.correct: Correct ‚Äî negative places pronouns before the verb: **no me lo digas**.
